#summary Basic Build Instructions

= Introduction =

AMOP is very light-weight library. 

= MS VC =

  # Open _AMOP.sln_ in source directory.
  # Build the whole solution.
  # Run the deploy.bat to copy all header and libs.

= GCC =

  # Unzip the source file, and run 'make'.
  # To make the UnitTest for Amop, please unzip the [http://unittest-cpp.sourceforge.net/ UnitTest++] in the source directory, and run 'make test'
